title: Songs from the Edge of the World (punk comp, 2013)
description:
Songs from the Edge of the World (2013)
punk compilation
Superior Viaduct
MP3 - 192 kbps

Excellent selection of punk, post-punk, and new wave tracks coming out of Los Angeles and San Francisco, c. 1977-1981. It was included as a musical accompaniment to Ruby Ray's 2013 book, From the Edge of the World, which features her photos of early punk scenes in LA and SF. Includes tracks by Germs, Avengers, Dils, Bags, Offs, Screamers, Negative Trend, among others. A good introduction for anyone interested in American punk before it went hardcore.
